group_1.narration: "Yes. A girl who wished to play the lead role@in one of the stories she'd dreamed of..."
"...and who seemed to have obtained the same@'kotodama' magic that I did."

group_1.textLeft: Ruri wished for a miracle, so—@Why would she get THAT in return...?

group_1.textRight: Does wishing for something always result in@retribution?
Or was Ruri the only one who fate decided to toy@with like that...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, we haven't run afoul of anything like that.@...For what it's worth.
The others are probably out searching by now, so@we'd better search for Mihono too.

group_1.textRight: Yes... but the question is, where's the right place@to search?
I can't predict what "Ruri" will do in her broken state.
If, hypothetically, she were to continue following@the script...

group_1.textLeft: Then she'll come to kill "Tsukihiko"...@that is to say, me.

group_1.textRight: She wasn't trying to kill you when we encountered@her a few minutes ago.
Will she attack us again?@Or will she attempt something else...?

group_1.textLeft: You don't think she might try to commit suicide@alone, do you?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I suppose that's also possible.
...This gets worse by the minute.@We'd better find Mihono fast.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's get a move on!
Oh— no, wait.@Hang on a sec.
Might be useful for something! You never know.
